item.title: My Way Of Explaining
item.description: The whole problem of existence is that we are are like a river, but not minds always flowing restless, unable to stop. Sit by a river with me. See how the water moves. Touches one thing, goes on. Rest in a deep pool, behind a log. Itâ€™s cold, this water. It will wake you up. This river is you, and me. The water is your mind.
